definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: A novel UV-vis detector for high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新型的高效液相色谱紫外可见检测器。

sentences.english: A continuously variable potentiometer is connected into the detector bridge network.
sentences.chinese: 在检测器桥路中，接有可调电位器。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, vehicle speeds cannot be directly measured by single-loop detectors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，交通速度并不能直接从单线圈检测器测量出来。

sentences.english: Capsule images were viewed on a real-time viewer.
sentences.chinese: 胶囊图像被呈现到一台实时检测器上。

sentences.english: The abbrev attribute defines a short abbreviation for the detector.
sentences.chinese: abbrev属性定义检测器的缩写。

sentences.english: The high-tech backpacks they wear to monitor pollution are tiny and light as a feather.
sentences.chinese: 鸽子背的高科技污染检测器像羽毛一样又小又轻。

sentences.english: Several related detectors may be grouped together by sharing the same abbreviation.
sentences.chinese: 可以用同一个缩写将几个相关的检测器组织到一起。

sentences.english: Why would you want to write custom bug detectors?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要编写自定义缺陷检测器？

sentences.english: The detector temperature can also affect the observed peak height if its response is temperature dependent.
sentences.chinese: 检测器温度的改变也会影响那些相应的峰高。

sentences.english: The purity of argon was analyzed by gas chromatography with argon discharge detector.
sentences.chinese: 采用氩放电检测器气相色谱仪分析了氩气纯度。

sentences.english: The urinary concentrations of lactulose and mannitol were determined by a refractive index detector .
sentences.chinese: 上用示差检测器测定尿液中乳果糖和甘露醇的浓度。

sentences.english: A gas chromagraph equipped with a hydrogen flame detector is used.
sentences.chinese: 使用一台配有氢火焰检测器的气相色谱仪。

sentences.english: Two-pole filter(TPF)is a recurrence feedback accumulation detector implementing multi-quantization accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 双极点滤波器是一种递归型的反馈积累检测器。

sentences.english: The Monitor had to be strapped to the runner's waist facing forward.
sentences.chinese: 这个检测器必须面朝前绑在跑步者的腰部。

sentences.english: Open and close valve is equipped for front-end memory type alloy detector and upper shifting fork.
sentences.chinese: 并设前端装记忆合金检测器与上拨叉配合的开闭阀。

sentences.english: FPD detector easy to fire, greatly increase the workload of the analysis.
sentences.chinese: FPD检测器容易灭火，分析工作量大大增加。
